name: Shoot the Balls (itch)
description:
Welcome to our very first game-project.

Shoot the Balls is a small and simple, yet quite fun, game where you simply are supposed to shoot the balls that are jumping around in the window. Hitting a smaller ball gives you more points than hitting a larger one. How many points can YOU get?

The game ends when you are out of ammo, or when the timer counts down to 0.  

GOOD LUCK, HAVE FUN!
